moduware-header.copy: Debug information copied to your clipboard

disconnected.title: Slide left!
disconnected.message: Let's connect your Moduware device to your phone! To manage connections and devices use sidebar.

autoconnecting.title: Auto Connecting
autoconnecting.message: Connecting to your device. You can manage paired devices in settings.

connected.editInstructions: To switch between tiles tap on the module you want to change.

initializing.title: Initializing modules
initializing.message: It will take a few seconds to initialize all modules.

checking.title: Checking for updates
checking.message: It will take a few seconds to check for new updates.

noUpdates.title: No new updates available
noUpdates.message: You have latest version of software for current configuration

tiles.title: Available tiles
tiles.instruction: Select a tile you want to switch to.

autoConnecting.title: Auto Connecting
autoConnecting.message: Connecting to your device. You can manage paired devices in settings.

disconnected.title: Connect Modpack
disconnected.message: Find the device you want to connect to

scanning.title: Looking for Modpack
scanning.message: Make sure your bluetooth and Modpack are On

notFound.title: Device not found
notFound.message: Try again and make sure that your Modpack is On
